Our Partner

How does it feel to go through cancer?

Dear James,

Everyone's journey through cancer is different. From noticing the first signs, to telling friends and family, no two stories are the same.

We've pulled together the memories and reflections of the people who know this the best. So you can see how people living with cancer are feeling right now. And how your donations help us support them every step of the way.

Thank you for your support.

The Cancer Research UK team

Patients are being let down

Imagine you have been told you have cancer. And then being told you have over 8 weeks before treatment can start. After 2 years of missed NHS targets, real people are being left in limbo when it comes to waiting tmes.

Read more
  

Do something amazing today. Donate to help beat cancer sooner

Cancer is happening right now

Right now, Isla Grace is becoming a normal 2 year old again – a year after being treated for Ewing's Sarcoma.

 
Read more about Isla

Talking about cancer is hard

Our 'Talk Cancer' training gives volunteers and health workers the skills to talk to people about cancer. And it's already saving lives.
